evidence: Finally, g is what we actually record - the image data.

concepts.term: This linear system model is the foundation for both image reconstruction and image analysis

evidence: H denotes the imaging operator which represents the imaging system.

triples.evidence: Every real imaging system is contaminated by noise - whether it’s photon noise, electronic noise, or other random fluctuations. That uncertainty is inherent to the physics of measurement.
